body: I want this translated and hope it's not NTR, but... god dammit, why did the artist have to make the sex scene on the tiled pool floor.  I couldn't fully enjoy the beautiful art with my brain going "Get a kick board under her head!  My god, the tiles have crevices and they scrape like a motherfucker, stop it!  Dude if you like her at all you know that shit is ridiculously painful, every swimmer's slid on those tile floors by accident before!  AGH!!"
